com.amsterdam.marktbureau.makkelijkemarkt.api

Interface MakkelijkeMarktApi


  • public interface MakkelijkeMarktApi
    Makkelijke Markt Api interface defining the retrofit api calls
    Author:
    marcolangebeeke

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        @GET(value="version/")
retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonObject> getVersion()
        Get version details of the Api and Android app
        Returns:
        a gson object containing the version info

      • getAccounts

        @GET(value="account/")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiAccount>> getAccounts()
        Get a list of accounts from the Api
        Returns:
        a list of ApiAccount objects

      • getMarkten

        @GET(value="markt/")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiMarkt>> getMarkten()
        Get a list of markten from the Api
        Returns:
        a list of ApiMarkt objects

      • postLoginBasicId

        @POST(value="login/basicId/")
retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonObject> postLoginBasicId(@Body
                                                                                          com.google.gson.JsonObject auth)
        Post an Account authentication request to the Api
        Parameters:
        auth - a gson object containing the account credentials
        Returns:
        a gson object containing the result with an Api key on success

      • getLogout

        @GET(value="logout/")
retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonObject> getLogout()
        Send Get request to logout of the api server session
        Returns:
        a gson object with object lifeTime set to 0

      • getDagvergunningen

        @GET(value="dagvergunning/")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiDagvergunning>> getDagvergunningen(@Query(value="marktId")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String marktId,
                                                                                                 @Query(value="dag")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String dag)
        Get a list of dagvergunningen for a given markt and date
        Parameters:
        marktId - the id of the markt
        dag - the date
        Returns:
        a list of ApiDagvergunning objects

      • postDagvergunning

        @POST(value="dagvergunning/")
retrofit2.Call<ApiDagvergunning> postDagvergunning(@Body
                                                                                 com.google.gson.JsonObject dagvergunning)
        Post a new dagvergunning
        Parameters:
        dagvergunning - a gson object containing the dagvergunning values
        Returns:
        a apidagvergunning object containing the result

      • putDagvergunning

        @PUT(value="dagvergunning/{id}")
retrofit2.Call<ApiDagvergunning> putDagvergunning(@Path(value="id")
                                                                                   java.lang.String id,
                                                                                   @Body
                                                                                   com.google.gson.JsonObject dagvergunning)
        Put an existing dagvergunning
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the existing dagvergunning
        dagvergunning - a gson object containing the dagvergunning values
        Returns:
        a apidagvergunning object containing the result

      • deleteDagvergunning

        @DELETE(value="dagvergunning/{id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.String> deleteDagvergunning(@Path(value="id")
                                                                                         java.lang.String id)
        Delete a dagvergunning
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the dagvergunning

      • postDagvergunningConcept

        @POST(value="dagvergunning_concept/")
retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonObject> postDagvergunningConcept(@Body
                                                                                                          com.google.gson.JsonObject dagvergunning)
        Post a new dagvergunning concept to get a factuur with pricing
        Parameters:
        dagvergunning - a gson object containing the dagvergunning values
        Returns:
        a json object containing the factuur details

      • getKoopmannen

        @GET(value="koopman/")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiKoopman>> getKoopmannen(@Query(value="status")
                                                                                java.lang.String status,
                                                                                @Query(value="listOffset")
                                                                                java.lang.String listOffset,
                                                                                @Query(value="listLength")
                                                                                java.lang.String listLength)
        Get a list of koopmannen for a given status from the Api
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the koopman
        listOffset - the offset of from which position we want to query the total list
        listLength - the length of the response list
        Returns:
        a list of ApiKoopman objects

      • getKoopmanByErkenningsnummer

        @GET(value="koopman/erkenningsnummer/{erkenningsnummer}")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKoopman> getKoopmanByErkenningsnummer(@Path(value="erkenningsnummer")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String erkenningsnummer)
        Get a koopman object, including sollicitaties, from the api
        Parameters:
        erkenningsnummer - the erkenningsnummer as a path segment parameter
        Returns:
        an ApiKoopman object

      • getKoopmanByPasUid

        @GET(value="koopman/pasuid/{pasUid}")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKoopman> getKoopmanByPasUid(@Path(value="pasUid")
                                                                                    java.lang.String pasUid)
        Get a koopman object, including sollicitaties, from the api
        Parameters:
        pasUid - the pas UID as a path segment parameter
        Returns:
        an ApiKoopman object

      • getSollicitaties

        @GET(value="sollicitaties/markt/{marktId}")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiSollicitatie>> getSollicitaties(@Path(value="marktId")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String marktId,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="listOffset")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String listOffset,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="listLength")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String listLength)
        Get a list of sollicitaties for a given marktid from the Api
        Parameters:
        marktId - the id of the marktet we want the sollicitaties for
        listOffset - the offset of from which position we want to query the total list
        listLength - the length of the response list
        Returns:
        a list of ApiSollicitatie objects

      • getNotities

        @GET(value="notitie/{marktId}/{dag}")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ApiNotitie>> getNotities(@Path(value="marktId")
                                                                                             java.lang.String marktId,
                                                                                             @Path(value="dag")
                                                                                             java.lang.String dag,
                                                                                             @Query(value="verwijderdStatus")
                                                                                             java.lang.String verwijderdStatus)
        Get a list of notities for a given markt and date
        Parameters:
        marktId - the id of the markt
        dag - the date
        verwijderdStatus - the status of the notitie
        Returns:
        a list of ApiNotitie objects

      • putNotitie

        @PUT(value="notitie/{id}")
retrofit2.Call<ApiNotitie> putNotitie(@Path(value="id")
                                                                 java.lang.String id,
                                                                 @Body
                                                                 com.google.gson.JsonObject notitie)
        Put an existing notitie
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the existing notitie
        notitie - a gson object containing the notitie values
        Returns:
        a apinotitie object containing the result
